basic.description: The general principles and mechanisms of immune reaction. Immunochemical and immunobiological aspects of antibody formation and cell-mediated immunity in health and disease will be considered. (Offered concurrently with MICR-360 with additional work required.) Fall term, three lecture hours. M. Szewczuk EXCLUSION: MICR-860*
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Immunology
